citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:18pm on
December 3, 2021. Called the home phone and left voicemail at 1:18 PM requesting an inspection. Also, called the cell
phone, but voicemail was full. USDA Inspectors waited 30 minutes and licensee called at 1:59 PM stating that he was
unavailable for an inspection and his caretaker for the animals would not be available until after 6 PM.
Additional Inspectors:
E GONZALEZ, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:18pm on 
December 3, 2021.  Called the home phone and left voicemail at 1:18 PM requesting an inspection.  Also, called the cell 
phone, but voicemail was full.  USDA Inspectors waited 30 minutes and licensee called at 1:59 PM stating that he was 
unavailable for an inspection and his caretaker for the animals would not be available until after 6 PM. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
E GONZALEZ, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
